ROW.DATDSC: select to_char(crtdat,'MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')||' '||name name from RunOSTimerDTL where id='[%jobseqid]' order by crtdat desc,seqid desc
select floor( ( (select max(crtdat) from RunOSTimerDTL where id='[%jobseqid]' )- (select min(crtdat) from RunOSTimerDTL where id='[%jobseqid]') ) * 24*60*60 ) name from dual
delete from RunOSTimer where id='[%jobid]'; delete from RunOSTimerDTL where id='[%jobid]'
